ComicInfo.Summary: Crown Heights Part 1: Intrepid reporter, Gretchen, decides that police officer Sara Pezzini and her strange powers would make a fantastic story and begins to follow her. Sara and Patrick investigate the brutal murder of a rabbi in Crown Heights but find the strict Jewish community secretive and uncooperative. Sara discovers that Gretchen is shadowing her and tries to warn her off.
ComicInfo.Title: Crown Heights Part 1
